trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_SEQ_00<tab>Concern is writ plain upon Varshahn's face.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the deserter voidsent.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Varshahn.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Meghaduta attendant.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Even those part voidsent require rest, I imagine. And her own abode seems as good a place as any.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_YSHTOLA_100_001<tab>Unlike the Source, however, there is scant ambient aether for her to draw upon here...
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>In her present state, Zero is easy prey for other voidsent. We must be on our guard.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Though so slow as to be nearly imperceptible, Zero's chest rises and falls in a steady rhythm...
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_020<tab>How long do you suppose she will remain this way?
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_YSHTOLA_000_024<tab>I haven't the faintest inkling, nor can I say whether the aether we can afford to share will be enough to awaken her.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>'Twould be best to take her back with us to the Source. There, she would be guaranteed all she requires.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_026<tab>Zero cannot give her consent, but it seems we have no choice. The alternative would be to leave her here, defenseless.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_100_026<tab>Should she later desire it, we can bring her home.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_027<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, might I ask you to hold on to Barbariccia's memoria? It may yet serve a purpose.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04596B_000_028<tab>Oh? What happened to her?
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_ESTINIEN_000_029<tab>You have business with Zero?
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04596B_000_030<tab>We have a newcomer─a former minion of Barbariccia.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04596B_000_031<tab>Let her know when she wakes, will you?
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_032<tab>Barbariccia's minion...
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>Why not go and find this newcomer? So we have something to tell Zero, if nothing else.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_100_033<tab>Indeed...
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_034<tab>May I trouble you to join me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? With luck, we might learn something of Golbez.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_YSHTOLA_000_100<tab>Worry not, we will keep an eye on Zero. Go and meet this newcomer.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_ESTINIEN_000_105<tab>When the leader falls, the minions pledge themselves to the enemy. There's no loyalty─only survival.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_110<tab>This appears to be the newcomer.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04598_000_120<tab><gasp> Y-You're the ones who felled Barbariccia!
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04598_100_120<tab>I-I won't make trouble. I-I'll obey. So please, let me stay!
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_121<tab>If you would obey, then tell me all you know of Golbez.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04598_000_123<tab>Th-There isn't much I <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> tell. Only the archfiends are allowed into his domain, wherever it is. None but they know.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_124<tab>I see... No better way to guard oneself than keeping one's location secret.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_100_124<tab>How does Golbez communicate with his minions afield?
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04598_000_125<tab>He has these...scepters? Staves? Whatever they are, he uses them to talk to those far away.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_127<tab>Not unlike linkpearls, at least in function... That will be all. My thanks for your cooperation.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_128<tab>My thanks to you as well for affording me the time.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_100_128<tab>I am satisfied, so let us rejoin the others and head home.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_YSHTOLA_000_200<tab>Vrtra has told all. Golbez goes to great lengths indeed to conceal his whereabouts.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_ESTINIEN_000_205<tab>While I'm sure Nahbdeen has matters under control, I can't help but worry. Let's not keep them waiting.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VOIDSENT04598_000_210<tab>Whenever Barbariccia moved her domain, some would get left behind. No such worries here.

TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_220<tab>I trust you understand that once we leave the Thirteenth, we will not return until we are prepared to resume our search. Knowing this, are you ready to depart?
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_SYSTEM_000_221<tab>You will not be able to freely return to the Thirteenth. Are you certain you wish to leave?
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_VARSHAHN_000_222<tab>Back to Troia, then, and thence home...

TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_400<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, we have been expecting you. If you would follow me, I will show you to the guest chambers.
TEXT_AKTKMI107_04598_SYSTEM_000_401<tab>Proceed to the Meghaduta guest chambers?
